dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18 x 25 cm (7 1/16 x 9 13/16 in.)
title: Chintz fragment
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordant for 2 reds and purple applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied (probably by immersion) over resist (chintz).
description: Stripes of roses and ribbons on different background. Three pieces sewn together.
name: Chintz fragment
